name: Poc la bille!
description:
GAME   

Poc la bille is a hypercasu where the goal is to aim and reach a target in 3 shot

    FEATURES

More than 10 levels !

CONTROLS   

PRESS the ball and shoot !

    THE TEAM 

Charlélie Garrigues - Leo Legendre - Stanislas Rado

CONTEXT   

This game was developed in 3 days for a Game Jam at the IIM Digital School in Paris. We had a lot of fun working on this project, so we hope you'll enjoy it !
